resources.string:
FLINGER is a single player game where the aim is to hit the targets on the other side of the screen.
The path to the screen is blocked by obstacles. These obstacles will increase as you progress through the game. In addition, the target will become smaller and harder to hit. 
To play the game, you need to fling from the bottom of the screen to the middle of the screen, aiming the ball towards the target. The game finishes when you miss the target or when you hit the die obstacle. 

The obstacles can be identified by their colour. Here are the obstacles: 
Blue: Ball 
Green: Target 
Red: Minus 1 to your score 
Orange: Switch the left right direction of the ball 
Black: Your game ends 

Game designed by Connor Welham and Zane Prior for COMPX202.
